name: Shield of Achilles
printed_effect:
This Shield of Achilles can only be Cast after
an opponent’s Elestral declares an attack.
Expend {omni} equal to that Elestral's
Enchantment Cost in order to Negate that
attack and return that Elestral to their hand.
effect: This Shield of Achilles can only be played after an opponent's Elestral declares an attack. Expend {omni} equal to that Elestral's Enchantment Cost in order to Negate that attack and return that Elestral to their hand.
